title: Stuck In game bug
body:
Hey,
My client is glitched and it says i'm still in a game when i'm not and I can't do anything about it, Tried logging out and closing client.

http://prntscr.com/7trgbt

http://prntscr.com/7trghj

replies.body: same here. got all the way to the stats screen. it asked if I wanted to wait for stats and I hit no. After that I could not get into battles
i'm in the same situation as you, did your opponents or yourselves surrender by any chance? or did you destroy the nexus

> [{quoted}](name=Gnarmy of One,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=cRgMeORY,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-07-17T13:24:42.094+0000)
>
> They Surrendered

Mine surrendered as well, my friends and I are stuck as well
me too and 3 of my friends are experiencing the same problem. sydney
